Writer module¶

For writing the data to file use Writer class:

class Writer.Writer¶

Writer class is used for creating file with coming data

Attributes

Parameters:

WriterException (class) -- custom exception for Writer class

Methods

write_to_file()

Write coming data to file

exception WriterException(message)¶

Custom exception for Writer inherited from Exception

Attributes

Parameters:

message (string) -- exception message

write_to_file(path, data)¶

Write coming data to file: if it possible

Parameters:

  • path (string) -- path for writing file

  • data (string) -- writing information

Raises:

Writer.WriterException -- if couldn't write data to file

Voight-Kampff test
